typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceOutput
sourceOutput select(mapColumn(
		AC_REG = Column_1,
		EVE = Column_2,
		DESC = Column_3,
		BEGINDAY = Column_4,
		BEGINTIME = Column_5,
		ENDDAY = Column_6,
		ENDTIME = Column_7,
		BAS = Column_8
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRenameColums
SelectRenameColums derive(BEGINDAY = toTimestamp(substring(BEGINDAY, 1, 4)+'-'+substring(BEGINDAY, 5, 2)+'-'+substring(BEGINDAY, 7,2), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		BEGINTIME = (substring(BEGINTIME,1, 2) + ':' + substring(BEGINTIME,3, 2)),
		ENDDAY = toTimestamp(substring(ENDDAY, 1, 4)+'-'+substring(ENDDAY, 5, 2)+'-'+substring(ENDDAY, 7,2), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		ENDTIME = (substring(ENDTIME,1, 2) + ':' + substring(ENDTIME,3, 2))) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true) ~> sink1
